name: Carrot
description: A crunchy, sweet root vegetable rich in beta-carotene.

name: Broccoli
description: A green vegetable with a tree-like structure, high in fiber and vitamins.

name: Spinach
description: A leafy green vegetable packed with iron and vitamins.

name: Bell Pepper
description: A sweet, crunchy vegetable that comes in various colors like red, yellow, and green.

name: Tomato
description: A juicy fruit often treated as a vegetable, used in various dishes.

name: Potato
description: A versatile tuber vegetable rich in carbohydrates, ideal for many recipes.

name: Onion
description: A flavorful vegetable with layers, commonly used as a base for cooking.

name: Cucumber
description: A cool, refreshing vegetable often eaten raw or in salads.

name: Cauliflower
description: A white, crunchy vegetable that can be used as a rice substitute.

name: Eggplant
description: A purple vegetable with a spongy texture, great for grilling and roasting.

name: Zucchini
description: A green squash that is versatile and can be grilled, roasted, or eaten raw.

name: Peas
description: Small, round green vegetables that are sweet and often used in soups and stews.
